data.title: K-PAX: a Novel by Brewer, Gene: Fine Softcover (1995) Advance Reading Copy; First Printing., Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780312118402 - Signed by Author(s) - Advance Reading Copy; First Printing. - Softcover - St. Martin's Press, New York - 1995 - Condition: Fine - A smart Advance Reader edition in Fine condition with trivial edgewear. Signed by author Gene Brewer directly on the title page; Brewer's novel about a psychiatric patient who claims to be from another planet (K-PAX) , his relationship with his doctor, and with the other patients at the hospital. Basis for the 2001 motion picture starring Kevin Spacey and Jeff Bridges; 8vo; [6], 231 [232] pages; Signed by Author - K-PAX: a Novel
